     single: causally upstream of; RO_0002411

RO_0002411 - causally upstream of
====================================================================================

.. topic:: Alternate name for causally upstream of

    None


.. topic:: Definition

    p is causally upstream of q if and only if p precedes q and p and q are linked in a causal chain


.. topic:: Definition Source

    None


.. topic:: Example

    None


.. topic:: Editor's Note

    None


.. topic:: Term Editor

    Chris Mungall
